title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta. In a separate pan, cook the pancetta. Beat the eggs and mix with the cheese. Combine everything and season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Grill the chicken. Prepare the tomato sauce with spices and cream. Combine and cook for 10 minutes.
